plot: Springfield gets a bedbug scare, the new assistant pastor at church appoints Homer as a deacon, and Marge loses her wedding dress.

Following an infestation of bugs the Simpsons send their clothes to be dry-cleaned but Marge's wedding dress ends up with Krusty and Lisa plays sleuth to get it back. Meanwhile trendy new vicar Elijah Hooper appoints Homer as a deacon, causing Tim Lovejoy to resign and Bart and Milhouse to join forces with Ned Flanders to restore the old order - helped by the bugs.—don @ minifie-1
